title: Book on Demonetization
selftext:
I wanted to share one of the very insightful books that I found on demonetization (2016). 

The book “Demonetization and the Black Economy” has been a great resource on what occurred during the demonetization event. It’s helped me ground a lot of conversations into reality when discussing with family and friends. 

While a some of the reviews on good reads say that none of the predictions were accurate, I do think that there’s an ample amount data on the exact sequence of events during the aftermath. 

I’m also curious to know if there are any more books / papers people might want to recommend in this thread. 

If you’ve read the book and can contend precisely on any of the points highlighted with references please leave a response here. I’d prefer it people don’t brigade the post.
